attributes.action: investiagate the claim that Titus Bramble is in a fact a footballer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Titus Bramble Newcastle FC is classed as being a professional footballer. Given his lack of talent it is apparent that the British Public are being misled and the title of professional footballer on this occasion is wholly inappropriate

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
